setup.title: Adventure Forge
setup.subtitle: Craft your adventure's rules and let AI bring it to life.
setup.scenarioPromptPlaceholder: Describe your world, character, and adventure in detail. For example: A noir detective in a city where magic is illegal, investigating the magical murder of a high-profile politician. My character is a grizzled former battlemage named Kaelen, now working as a private eye...
setup.validationError: Please fill in all required fields.

game.attachedContext: Attached as context for your next action.

crafting.dropPrompt: Click items from your inventory to add them here.

veo.title: Video Generation Request
veo.loading4: Finalizing the timeline. This may take a few minutes.

ariaLabels.toggleVoiceInput: Toggle voice input for main text area

inventory.itemSelected: {itemName} selected. Press Enter on a container title to move.
inventory.moveErrorTargetNotFound: Failed to find target inventory {containerName}. Move cancelled.

saveModal.prompt: Enter a name for your save:

loadConfirm.fileMessage: Load game from file? All unsaved progress will be lost.
loadConfirm.codexMessage: Load game "{name}"? All unsaved progress will be lost.

restartConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to restart? All unsaved progress will be lost.

game.autoPlayError: Auto-play stopped due to an error.

qte.title: Summoning Ritual
qte.instruction: Input the sequence before time runs out!

anomaly.resolutionAction: The summoning ritual for '{originalAction}' was successful, but a surge of wild magic caused an anomaly! Describe something completely random and unexpected appearing instead of the intended creature. It could be something mundane, silly, or from another world entirely (e.g., a sports car, a shower of rabbits, a mischievous cartoon creature, a ghost from a horror movie).

critical_failure.resolutionAction: The summoning ritual for '{originalAction}' failed catastrophically. Describe a massive, uncontrolled, city-destroying monster (like Godzilla) appearing and causing chaos.

failure.resolutionAction: The summoning ritual for '{originalAction}' failed. Creatively describe a twisted, ugly, comedic, or pun-based parody of the intended creature. The result should be surprising and reflect a clear failure.

success.resolutionAction: The player's summoning ritual for '{originalAction}' was successful. Describe the intended creature appearing under their control and add it to the game state.

critical_success.resolutionAction: The player's summoning ritual for '{originalAction}' was a critical success. Describe a much more powerful or impressive version of the intended creature appearing under their control, and add it to the game state.

service.errorInit: Failed to start the adventure. An unknown error occurred.
service.errorTurn: The story could not continue. An unknown error occurred.
service.errorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
service.errorLoad: Failed to load save file. It might be corrupted or in an invalid format.
service.errorRateLimit: You have exceeded the API request limit. Please wait a moment and try again.
service.errorBusy: The AI is currently busy. Please wait for the current action to complete.
service.errorConflict: The application is busy processing another operation. Please wait for it to complete to avoid conflicts.
service.errorInvalidApiKey: Your API key is not valid or could not be found. Please select a valid key in the settings.
service.errorPromptBlocked: The request was blocked due to safety settings. Please modify your prompt and try again.
service.errorServer: The AI model server is currently experiencing issues. Please try again later.
service.errorRollback: A critical error occurred. Reverting to the state before your last action.
service.fallbackMessage: API limit reached. Switched to a fallback text-only model. Media generation is temporarily disabled.
service.errorTtsModel: TTS model not configured in settings.

imagePrompt.character: Pixel art JRPG-style portrait of a character. White background. Character: {description}
imagePrompt.map: A stylized world map for a tabletop RPG. Genre and tone: {genreAndTone}. The story is about: {goal}.
imagePrompt.location: A scenic view of a location in a tabletop RPG, 16:9 aspect ratio. The location is: {location}. Genre and tone: {genreAndTone}.

cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk 'Panpsychic' World
cyberpunk.description: A 'panpsychic' world where stars, battleships, mechs, concepts, and everything else can possess consciousness known as a 'Digital Soul'. Magical girls, angels, demons, gods, Taoist priests, and monsters coexist peacefully with humans, and technology has advanced to the interstellar travel stage.

fantasy.title: Classic High Fantasy
fantasy.description: The kingdom of Eldoria, a land of ancient forests, soaring mountains, and hidden magic. The peace between humans, elves, and dwarves is fragile, maintained by a pact sworn under the watchful eyes of the Elder Dragons.

space.title: Space Opera: The Galactic Concord
space.description: The Galactic Concord, a sprawling alliance of diverse alien species in the year 2842. Hyperspace travel is common via the 'Star-Streams', but the furthest reaches of the galaxy, the 'Veil Nebula', remain uncharted and dangerous.

kancolle.title: Ship Girls World (Pre-WWI)
kancolle.description: A world similar to our own before World War I. However, historical warships (pre-WWI, WWI, WWII, Cold War) are manifested as 'Ship Girls' (Kanmusu) - young women equipped with naval armaments.

mahjong.title: Superpowered Mahjong World
mahjong.description: A world obsessed with mahjong, where prodigies and professionals have near-supernatural abilities related to the game. It's a slice-of-life setting reminiscent of mahjong anime.

witch.title: Cosmic Witch Society
witch.description: A universe where witches are immense power, with technology and magic so advanced they traverse and govern territories spanning 10^N worlds. New witches are born from 'witch eggs' or through the natural magical saturation of other species. Their society is perfectly stable and without threats due to their overwhelming power.

foxgod.title: Modern 'All Things Have Spirits' World
foxgod.description: A 'panpsychic' world where stars, battleships, mechs, concepts, and everything else can possess consciousness. Magical girls, angels, demons, gods, Taoist priests, and youkai coexist peacefully with humans, and technology has advanced to the interstellar travel stage.

soul-tuner.title: The Abyss Echo Anomaly
soul-tuner.description: In the neon-drenched metropolis of 'Neo-Aethelburg', you are hired to investigate a series of incidents where Digital Souls are inexplicably going berserk or silent. The clues point to a mysterious code, 'The Abyss Echo', hidden deep within the network.

dragons-ire.title: The Dragon's Ire
dragons-ire.description: The great dragon Ignis has awoken from his thousand-year slumber, his rage setting the northern mountains ablaze. You are tasked by the desperate King to journey to the forgotten Sunken City of Aerthos to retrieve the legendary Sunstone before Ignis's fury consumes the land.

star-stream.title: The Veil Nebula Signal
star-stream.description: You are part of the vanguard crew of the explorer vessel 'Odyssey', commissioned for a perilous journey into the Veil Nebula, drawn by a repeating, complex signal that defies all known physics. As you venture deeper, you find that the nebula warps reality itself, and you are not the only ones seeking the signal's source.

survival.title: Survive Until Modern Times
survival.description: Your goal is simple: survive until the year 2000. You must avoid being drawn into the disputes between war-mongering and pacifist factions, evade dangerous missions, and live a peaceful life as the world changes around you.

mahjong-prodigy.title: The Unknowing Mahjong Prodigy
mahjong-prodigy.description: Your goal is to become a scientist. However, you have an unconscious, miraculous, talent for mahjong: you always get a winning hand (Tenhou) on your first draw. The problem is, you don't know or care about mahjong, so unless someone points it out, you won't even realize you've won.

witch-graduate.title: A Witch's First Steps
witch-graduate.description: As a newly 'hatched' witch, you have just graduated, which signifies adulthood. You are no longer cared for by your kin and must now make your own decisions about your life, your path, and your place in the vast, magical cosmos.

little-god.title: A Little God's Beginning
little-god.description: As a minor local god born from a makeshift shrine, your initial goal is to gather a few believers and establish your presence in the bustling metropolis. You need to perform small miracles, answer prayers, and navigate the complex relationship between the divine and mortal realms in the modern age.

character.title: Character
character.customDescription: Describe your character in the prompt box.

zero.title: Zero, the Soul-Tuner
zero.description: An aloof 'Soul-Tuner' who can communicate directly with 'Digital Souls' through a specialized cybernetic body. They always wear a black trench coat that resists electronic interference, with a calm gaze that seems to be searching for their own lost past.

kaelen.title: Kaelen, the Dragon Warden
kaelen.description: A young, determined warrior from a remote mountain village, carrying the ancestral blade of the Dragon Wardens. They are skilled in combat but naive to the political intrigues of the kingdom's capital. They possess a rare, innate connection to the land's magical energies.

jax.title: Jax, the Star-Pilot
jax.description: A brilliant but reckless pilot and xeno-linguist, fascinated with the unknown. Jax left a promising career in the Concord Navy for the thrill of exploration. They are equipped with a state-of-the-art translation device and an advanced piloting rig integrated into their suit.

matsu.title: Matsu, the Coastal Defense Ship
matsu.description: A 'Matsu-class' coastal defense boat. Height 145cm, weight 47kg. Belongs to a local shore defense fleet under the Japanese navy. She is pragmatic and cautious, more concerned with patrolling her home waters than grand naval battles.

saki.title: Saki, the Child Prodigy
saki.description: A bright and diligent elementary school girl. She is a model student who loves science and dreams of becoming a scientist. She has absolutely no interest in mahjong.

nova.title: Nova, the Newly Hatched
nova.description: A young witch, freshly graduated and hatched from a witch egg. She is curious, powerful, and a blank slate, ready to choose her destiny among the infinite possibilities the universe offers.

kiko.title: Kiko, the Little Fox God
kiko.description: A young fox god (Nogami/Roboshin) of a small, makeshift shrine in a big city. Born from the casual worship of a few youths, she is cheerful, mischievous, and trying to figure out her role as a minor deity in a world of skyscrapers and spaceships.

cyber-blade.name: Cyber Blade
cyber-blade.description: A high-frequency blade for melee combat.

health-potion.name: Health Potion
health-potion.description: A magical potion that restores health.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.description: A traditional longbow for ranged attacks.

rations.name: Rations
rations.description: A day's worth of preserved food.

scanner.name: Scanner
scanner.description: A device to scan the environment for data.

fantasy-map.name: Fantasy World Map
fantasy-map.description: A map of a classic fantasy kingdom.

space-map.name: Space Sector Map
space-map.description: A star chart of a nebula-filled space sector.

cyberpunk-location.name: Cyberpunk Cityscape
cyberpunk-location.description: Towering skyscrapers under a neon sky.

space-location.name: Space Colony View
space-location.description: A view from inside a futuristic space colony.

settings.title: Settings

settings.apiKeyToast: Please select a VEO API key in the settings menu to generate video.

codex.subtitle: A persistent library of all your discovered characters, items, and locations.
codex.emptyCategory: No assets in this category yet. Play the game to discover them!
